question: The Business Summit of Indian and this country is concludes in Johannesburg.
explanation: Minister of Commerce and Industry and Civil Aviation, Suresh Prabhu, attended India- South Africa business summit in Johannesburg, South Africa. The visit began with a series of bilateral meetings. The Minister highlighted the historical relations between India and Swaziland, Botswana and Lesotho and pledged to take the economic partnership forward. The Minister also met members of India-South Africa CEOs forum who expressed confidence in the Government of India's efforts to strengthen India-Africa relations. Mr. Prabhu inaugurated a multi-sectoral exhibition at Johannesburg.
